fields.name: timing_plan_id
fields.description: Foreign key; connects to a timing_plan associated with a controller.

fields.name: signal_phase_num
fields.description: Signal phase number. Typically the NEMA phase number.

fields.name: min_green
fields.description: The minimum green time in seconds for an actuated signal. Green time in seconds for a fixed time signal.

fields.name: max_green
fields.description: Optional.The maximum green time in seconds for an actuated signal; the default is minimum green plus one extension

fields.name: extension
fields.description: Optional. The number of seconds the green time is extended each time vehicles are detected.

fields.name: clearance
fields.description: Yellow interval plus all red interval

fields.name: walk_time
fields.description: If a pedestrian phase exists, the walk time in seconds

fields.name: ped_clearance
fields.description: If a pedestrian phase exists, the flashing don't walk time.

fields.name: ring
fields.description: Required. Phases that may operate sequentially. With dual rings, two non-conflicting phases may operate at the same time

fields.name: barrier
fields.description: Required. Set of phases in both rings that must end at the same time

name: signal_timing_phase.schema.json
description: For signalized nodes, provides signal timing and establishes phases that may run concurrently.
